maha widyala, madhyamaha widyala aadi usas pasal ratapura wyaptha wana wita gami daruwanta usas adhyapanaye doratu wiwara wuyeya. 1960 wanawita tharamak wath pohosath kamin yuth gamiyange daruwo nawina sarasawi, karmika ha guru widyala walata athulath wannata wuha. 1972 wana wita mema thathwaya itha peralikari lesin wenas wannata wiya.

teli natya ranga shilpiyaku, nishpadakayaku, adhyakshawarayaku sema sarath namalgama wiwidha wu kala kshethrayan osse siya dayakathwaya ek karanu labuwe natya chithrapata handa kawim shilpiyeku, welenda danwim nirupana shilpiyaku, rupawahini niwedakayaku, des wides sangitha sandarshana sanwidhayakawarayaku lesinya. 1993 di swadhina rupawahiniye prawruththi niwedakaya lesin da sarath namalgama katayuthu karanu labiya.
